revised_title: The Minute Anatomy and Development of the Thymus
tldr: The author examines the minute anatomy, histology, and development of the thymus gland in various animals. They describe the structure and function of the thymus, its role in the immune system, and the process of involution. The study provides insights into the differences in thymus anatomy among different species and the role of granular cells, giant cells, and concentric corpuscles in the thymus's development and function.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Anatomy and Histology
